name: Gangrel
description:
I wanted to enter the jam despite not having a lot of time and create a game where I can connect my love for VtM universe, photography and old Newgrounds games / experimental games on Steam (such as Trauma). 

This is a short visual novel that perhaps betrays a bit too much by its name. You wake up alone, in a field, highly confused. There are 2 endings and 4 choices to be made. I estimate each play-through may take 10-15 minutes.

If you gave this game a look, thank you so much for your time and thank you for those running the game jam, it felt really freeing to be able to sit down and do something small, but creative. I loved every minute of making it.
